universal_guidelines: Always use Dark Mode by default. The app should feel like a 'night mode' interface.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Manrope' for body text.
Glassmorphism is mandatory for all cards and overlays. Never use solid opaque backgrounds for containers.
Primary action buttons must glow (box-shadow) to indicate interactivity.
Use generous padding (p-8, p-12) inside cards to avoid cramping.
All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Avoid pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use very dark slate (#020617) to add depth.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the provided colors. 2. Install the fonts in index.css. 3. Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the dark theme and font selection. 4. Build the 'Action Inbox' using the dashboard grid system. 5. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and demo data.
